group.name: Main examples page.
group.note: Woody is a new form framework for Cocoon. Woody is currently still alpha software and under active development. Your feedback is very much welcome on the Cocoon mailing lists.
group.sample: Currently the documentation is available on the Cocoon Wiki.

group.name: Woody Samples
